meanings.sent1: She enjoys poeticizing in her journal every evening.
meanings.sent2: The poet spent hours poeticizing about nature and love.
meanings.sent3: The cat poeticizing on the windowsill was a funny sight.
meanings.sent4: Her words poeticizing the sunset painted a beautiful picture in my mind.
meanings.sent5: The children were poeticizing their dreams in the school play.

meanings.definition: To make something poetic or imbue it with poetic qualities.
meanings.sent1: The artist was poeticizing the landscape with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent2: She had a talent for poeticizing even the simplest moments in life.
meanings.sent3: The chef poeticizing the dish with edible flowers was a unique touch.
meanings.sent4: His music poeticizing the emotions of the listeners touched their hearts.
meanings.sent5: The author was poeticizing the historical event in her novel.
